Version 2.0 is a major update to Relight that allows you to create spectacular HDR videos, adds support for iOS 10 and the iPhone 7, and more.

• Transform your videos with HDR (requires iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPod Touch 6 or later)
• Record live 1080P HDR videos (requires iPhone 6S, iPad Pro, or later)
• Quickly edit your last photo with the Relight Today Widget
• Optimized for iOS 10
• Optimized for the iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus
• Support for the iPhone 7 Plus dual cameras
• Wide color gamut support
• True Tone display support
• Visual quality improvements
• Bug fixes and other improvements

We’d love to hear what you think! If you have any questions or comments, email us at support@codeorgana.com.
